DOC.brief_summary: The role vitamin D deficiency female reproduction remain controversial . Early retrospective study inconsistent regard effect serum 25-OH vitamin D level pregnancy rate woman undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) , whereas two retrospective study postulate vitamin D deficiency may negatively affect pregnancy rate effect mediate endometrium . Taking account knock-out experiment show vitamin D receptor null mouse experience uterine hypoplasia also impaired folliculogenesis , might hypothesize vitamin D deficiency may detrimental effect female ovarian reserve . This may support previous report demonstrate serum 25-OH Vitamin D level correlate antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) level woman advance reproductive age .
